title: Week 12 Complementary and Alternative Medicine - Health Issues in a Multicultural Society Monica Allen MPH Health Science 135 6 Week 12 November | Course Hero
author: Daniel Lee Huynh
description: View Notes - Week 12 (Complementary and Alternative Medicine) from HPRF 135ITL at San Jose State University. Health Issues in a Multicultural Society Monica Allen, MPH Health Science 135 (6) Week 12;
cleaned_text: History of CAM Practices Prior to late 19th century, American medical care was provided by lay healers, naturopaths, homeopaths, midwives, and botanical healers, in addition to conventionally trained doctors 19th century advances in science led to standardization of medical training and practice by standardization of medical training and practice by the early 20th century In the first half of 20th century, nonconventional treatments were marginalized
